attributes.action: request the BBC to get Israel's specific support for it's stance on not broadcasting a request for humanitarian aid to Gaza - or broadcast
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC either have had feedback from Israel that they don't want this appeal broadcast; or are refusing for their own reasons. We should know if this is further Israel torture of the Palastinians or if the BBC have their own reasons for this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
